content: /*<![CDATA[*/ $('#title').html($('meta[name=map-description]').attr('content')); /*]]>*/ Service Gateway Firmware Version 3.0.9 June 17, 2024—Service Gateway Firmware Version 3.0.9 delivers key enhancements, bug fixes, and security updates. This update includes the following changes: This update includes support for server load balancing on Service Gateway appliances by leveraging Direct Server Return (DSR). This update provides a CLI command to check FQDN accessibility from the Service Gateway appliance. This update allows up to 5 NTP servers to be configured in the Service Gateway appliance. © 2025 Trend Micro Incorporated. All rights reserved.Search Knowledge Base
